system.description: For the duration you can use a standard action each round to evoke a dazzling beam of intense light. You can call forth one beam per three caster levels (maximum six at 18th). Each creature in the beam is blinded and takes 4d6 damage; creatures to which sunlight is harmful or unnatural take double. Reflex negates blindness and halves damage. An undead creature in the beam takes 1d6/level (max 20d6), or half on successful Reflex; undead harmed by bright light are destroyed if they fail the save. The ultraviolet light damages fungi, mold, oozes, and slimes as if they were undead.
system.duration: 1 round/level or until all beams used
system.savingThrow: Reflex negates and Reflex half; see text
